EmailTemplate.name: IAM_Create_Account
EmailTemplate.subject: You have been invited to create a Cummins account by {!User.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cummins
Cummins empowers customers to make informed, time-critical business decisions by providing actionable information about your Cummins powered equipment. Users will be able to sign up for other data enabled services as they become available. Please click the button below to accept the invitation and create a Cummins account.
Create your Account
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact 1-800-CUMMINSâ„¢ or your Cummins account representative. Thank you for your interest in Cummins.
Cummins https://cumminsengines.com/customer-care.aspx If you have trouble clicking on the button, please click here. This e-mail invitation is sent from Cummins.
